root_cause: Coating adhesion variability in specific polymer lot (PLT-2022-087)
corrective_action: Updated coating process parameters and tightened incoming material specification for polymer viscosity
preventive_action: Added in-process adhesion pull-test at 3 points per stent; updated supplier qualification requirements
effectiveness_check: Effectiveness confirmed: zero coating-related complaints from lots produced after corrective action (Jul-Dec 2023)
impact_summary: Coating process improvement resulted in elimination of delamination complaints from corrected lots

source: Packaging integrity finding during QC audit
root_cause: Foil seal weakness at corner welds on specific pouch size (CSX-3032/3532)
corrective_action: Replaced corner weld tooling and increased seal temperature by 5Â°C
preventive_action: Implemented 100% seal strength testing for affected pouch sizes; updated packaging validation protocol
effectiveness_check: Effectiveness confirmed: zero packaging seal failures in post-corrective production (Aug-Dec 2023)
impact_summary: Packaging seal integrity restored; no product quality impact confirmed through stability testing

root_cause: Delivery system tip deformation during tortuous anatomy navigation (suspected; investigation ongoing)
corrective_action: Interim: updated IFU with additional guidance for tortuous anatomy cases
preventive_action: Design review initiated for catheter tip reinforcement; prototype testing in progress
effectiveness_check: Pending - 6-month effectiveness review scheduled for Feb 2024
impact_summary: Investigation ongoing; interim risk mitigation through IFU update and physician advisory
